Traveling with the Central American caravan and the migrants themselves say they've seen no middle Easterners in their group despite the president's claims Trump conceded his ominous warnings might be unfounded buddy continues to insist the caravan and illegal immigration more generally pose a grave threat to the United states certainly you have people
